alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:19PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension and central Livingston Parishes through 615 PM CST... At 519 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prairieville, or 7 miles southeast of Oak Hills Place, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Numerous locations have recorded wind gusts from 35 to 45 mph. Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Gonzales, Walker, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Prairieville, Geismar, Whitehall and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 169 and 182. Interstate 12 between mile markers 10 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
